description: Gooey, crunchy, chocolatey and colourful. This recipe is everything you could want from rocky road. Plus, it's a great way to use up leftover Easter eggs.
name: Choc-Biscoff Rocky Road Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line a 20cm square (5cm deep) cake pan with baking paper, extending paper 3cm over edges.
Combine Easter eggs, noodles and marshmallows in a large bowl. Reserve 1/2 cup.

Place milk chocolate, spread and butter in a heatproof bowl. Microwave on high in 30-second intervals, stirring between bursts, or until melted. Pour chocolate mixture over noodle mixture and stir to combine. Spoon mixture into pan, then scatter over reserved noodle mixture.
Refrigerate for 2 hours or until set. Cut into pieces. Serve.
